arts.ttl: Lionel Messi scores for Inter Miami in 1-1 MLS tie with Toronto
arts.sum: Lionel Messi scored for the third time in four Major League Soccer matches this season, helping Inter Miami get a 1-1 tie with Toronto FC on Sunday night. Messi’s goal tied the match, three minutes after Federico Bernardeschi opened the scoring for Toronto (0-4-3).

arts.ttl: Lionel Messi could take another Inter Miami goal record against Toronto FC
arts.sum: Higuain, who played with Messi in his 75 games for the Argentina national team, was one of Miami's star signings during the club's early struggles in its first years in MLS By scoring his 23rd regular-season goal with the club against the Philadelphia Union in last week's 2-1 win, the Argentine No.10 equaled Gonzalo Higuain as the club's all-time leading scorer.
